metadata.code: National Building Code of Canada 2023 - Alberta Edition

requirements.description: Roofs with slopes of 60 degrees or more to horizontal that are adjacent to an occupied room shall be considered as a wall
requirements.exact_quote: roofs with slopes of 60° or more to the horizontal that are adjacent to a room or space intended for occupancy shall be considered as a wall

requirements.description: Sprinkler systems shall be designed, constructed and installed in conformance with Articles 3.2.5.12 to 3.2.5.15 and 3.2.5.17
requirements.exact_quote: Sprinkler systems shall be designed, constructed and installed in conformance with Articles 3.2.5.12 to 3.2.5.15 and 3.2.5.17

requirements.description: Home-type care occupancies with sleeping for not more than 10 persons shall be sprinklered per NFPA 13D
requirements.exact_quote: Home-type care occupancies with sleeping accommodation for not more than 10 persons shall...be sprinklered in conformance with NFPA 13D

requirements.description: Minimum 30-minute water supply for sprinkler system in home-type care occupancies
requirements.exact_quote: provided with a minimum 30-minute water supply for the sprinkler system

requirements.description: Fire-resistance ratings shall conform to the requirements in Part 3 and Appendix D
requirements.exact_quote: Fire-resistance ratings shall conform to the requirements in Part 3 and Appendix D

articles.title: Floor Assemblies to Have Fire-Resistance Rating

requirements.description: Floor assemblies required to have a fire-resistance rating shall have a rating of not less than 45 min
requirements.exact_quote: Floor assemblies required to have a fire-resistance rating shall have a rating of not less than 45 min

requirements.description: Suites of residential occupancy shall be separated from adjoining suites and public corridors by a fire separation
requirements.exact_quote: Suites of residential occupancy shall be separated from adjoining suites and from public corridors by a fire separation

requirements.description: Doors in fire separations between suites and corridors shall have a fire-protection rating of not less than 20 min
requirements.exact_quote: Doors in fire separations...shall have a fire-protection rating of not less than 20 min

requirements.description: Doors in fire separations shall be equipped with self-closing devices
requirements.exact_quote: be equipped with self-closing devices

requirements.description: Firewalls shall have a fire-resistance rating of not less than 2 h
requirements.exact_quote: Firewalls shall have a fire-resistance rating of not less than 2 h

requirements.description: Limiting distance shall be determined from exposing building face to property line or imaginary line between buildings
requirements.exact_quote: Limiting distance shall be determined from the exposing building face to the lot line, centreline of a street, lane or public thoroughfare

requirements.description: Maximum aggregate area of unprotected openings permitted in an exposing building face based on limiting distance per Table 9.10.14.4
requirements.exact_quote: Maximum aggregate area of unprotected openings...shall conform to Table 9.10.14.4

requirements.description: Detached houses and accessory buildings shall be not less than 1.2 m from the lot line
requirements.exact_quote: not less than 1.2 m from the lot line

requirements.description: Fire blocks shall be installed to cut off concealed draft openings at required locations
requirements.exact_quote: Fire blocks shall be installed to cut off concealed draft openings

articles.title: Fire Blocks for Horizontal Concealed Spaces

requirements.description: Horizontal concealed spaces in floor, ceiling or roof assemblies shall be divided into areas of not more than 20 m linear distance
requirements.exact_quote: horizontal concealed spaces...shall be divided into areas of not more than 20 m linear distance

requirements.description: Interior finish of wall and ceiling surfaces shall have a flame-spread rating not more than 150
requirements.exact_quote: Interior finish of wall and ceiling surfaces...shall have a flame-spread rating not more than 150

requirements.description: Interior finish in exits shall have a flame-spread rating not more than 25
requirements.exact_quote: Interior finish in exits...shall have a flame-spread rating not more than 25

requirements.description: Fire alarm systems required by Part 3 shall be installed
requirements.exact_quote: Fire alarm systems required by Part 3 shall be installed

requirements.description: Smoke alarms shall be installed in dwelling units on each storey containing sleeping rooms and on storeys adjacent to sleeping rooms
requirements.exact_quote: Smoke alarms shall be installed in each dwelling unit

requirements.description: Smoke alarms shall be located on or near the ceiling in a location that will provide warning to sleeping persons
requirements.exact_quote: Smoke alarms shall be located on or near the ceiling in a location that will provide warning to sleeping persons

requirements.description: Smoke alarms shall conform to CAN/ULC-S531 or ULC-S531 (photoelectric type recommended)
requirements.exact_quote: Smoke alarms shall conform to CAN/ULC-S531 or ULC-S531

requirements.description: Buildings shall be designed and constructed to provide access for fire department vehicles
requirements.exact_quote: Buildings shall be designed and constructed to provide access for fire department vehicles

requirements.description: Fire protection requirements apply to cooking equipment in dwelling units
requirements.exact_quote: This Subsection applies to cooking equipment in dwelling units

requirements.description: Cooktops and ranges shall be provided with automatic fire suppression or automatic shut-off devices
requirements.exact_quote: Cooktops and ranges shall be provided with...automatic fire suppression...or automatic shut-off devices
